title: High Silver/Gold Team LF Starting Mid and Subs ( All Roles )
body:
Storm is LF for a dedicated 18+ Mid laner who can win his lane and work well with a team. We need you to be willing to take criticism and play consistently as we will be playing in a 3 month tournament with matches every weekend and you must be available to practice daily. We will gladly work with your schedule and do the best we can to build that chemistry as well as being in a mature environment where we can play at a higher level. 

Requirements:

* Must be under Plat to be eligible for the tournament for all LoL Seasons
* Have consistent game time within this season
* Must be available and communicate not just in game but outside too
* Toxic behavior will not be tolerated 
* Must have ambition to play and improve

Please provide the following info to ask for a tryout

*Role

*Age

*OpGG

*Reason for joining

*Goals/Ambition

*Why you think you fit this position

If this appeals to you please contact me at the following
Discord: Kotorie #2563  

Disclaimer: Presentation will make the difference
If you are not performing or acting the way you should, we will have to reconsider and can be done so at any point in time. 
We are looking to have fun but we are also looking to perform and as such, expectations will be high. This is not just a game for us.

replies.body:
*Role - Mid/Jungle/Support

*Age - 21

*OpGG http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=ADC%20In%20My%20Prime
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Hauntzerˉ

*Reason for joining - LF a serious team to improve with and have a solid learning environment.

*Goals/Ambition - Plat 1 Flex/Gold 3 Solo que. Extend knowledge/experience of Mid lane. Add 2 more champs to Mid pool.

*Why you think you fit this position - Consistent laner, open schedule, serious when playing with teams

*Role - Mid

*Age - 28

*OpGG - http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=leftyraydy

*Reason for joining - To have fun

*Goals/Ambition - to gain LP and have fun

*Why you think you fit this position - Because I am flexible and go with the flow

*Role - ADC/Mid

*Age - 22

*OpGG - http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=try+tomorrow

*Reason for joining - Looking for a team to grow with. Just getting back into the game and I'm not in many groups/servers and don't have many friends that play the game. 

*Goals/Ambition - Improve/Tournaments

*Why you think you fit this position - I communicate, I play more than just mid. I know the game. Even if i lose lane i know how to snowball.

*Role - Mid

*Age- 21

*OpGG- http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=R%C3%A2m

*Reason for joining- Consistency

*Goals/Ambition- improve

*Why you think you fit this position- I play mid. I ward. I roam.{{champion:142}}
